Key Match Events: DR Congo sealed their place in the Africa Cup of Nations semi-finals after a 3-1 victory over Guinea.
Guinea were awarded a contentious penalty following Chancel Mbemba’s push on Mohamed Bayo.
Mohamed Bayo scored the penalty to give Guinea the lead.
Chancel Mbemba scored a swift response for DR Congo seven minutes later.
Yoane Wissa scored a penalty to give DR Congo a narrow advantage.
Arthur Masuaku scored a long-range free-kick to secure the victory for DR Congo.
Post-Match Reflections: DR Congo booked their spot in the last four of the competition for the first time since 2015.
Flashscore Man of the Match: Arthur Masuaku (DR Congo).
